snippet: The medical examiner has issued a homicide ruling in the death of 12-year-old Tamir Rice, who was said to be holding a toy gun when he was shot by a rookie Cleveland police officer.
abstract: Medical examiner rules that fatal shooting of 12-year-old Tamir Rice by rookie Cleveland police officer a homicide.
lead_paragraph: The medical examiner has issued a homicide ruling in the death of 12-year-old Tamir Rice, who was said to be holding a toy gun when he was shot by a rookie Cleveland police officer.

headline.main: Police Shooting of Tamir Rice Is Ruled a Homicide
headline.print_headline: Police Shooting of Boy Is Ruled a Homicide
